full_summary:
**Canada.ca Technology Benchmark Exercise in Support of Systems Re-procurement**
================================================================================================

**Tender Reference:** cb-9-7599180
**Solicitation Number:** 100024806
**Publication Date:** 2024-02-06
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-21 14:00:00
**Modification Date:** 2024-02-21

**Overview**
------------

The Employment and Social Development Canada is seeking a team and contractor to conduct a current state analysis and industry benchmark assessment to support the re-procurement of its principal system, Canada.ca. The purpose of this statement of work is to identify a team and contractor who are independent from technology firms and have access to research libraries, industry studies, and white papers.

**Tender Description**
----------------------

The contractor will be responsible for delivering two products:

* Baseline Benchmarking Analysis and Report: This deliverable will provide a benchmarking insight on the current capabilities and technologies of Canada.ca, as well as an industry benchmark assessment of web content management, cloud, and security providers.
* Canada.ca Technology Operating Model Review: This deliverable will provide a comprehensive evaluation of the technology operational model, including its strengths, areas for improvement, and gaps in comparison to industry standards and best practices.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The contractor's team will be evaluated based on a fixed price bid, with payments made by milestone. The selection criteria include:

* Technical merit
* Price
* Expertise in the field of business administration services

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is open to suppliers who are eligible to participate under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Cynthia Carty, Contracting Officer
Employment and Social Development Canada
Phone: (343
